author: nd
msg: Forward port: Escape special characters (especially control
characters) in mod_log_config to make a clear distinction between
client-supplied strings (with special characters) and server-side
strings. This was already introduced in version 1.3.25.
Obtained from: Patch in 1.3.25-dev by Martin
Reviewed by: Will Rowe, Jeff Trawick

author: nd
msg: Check also err_headers_out for an already set Content-Encoding:
gzip header. This prevents gzip compressed content from a CGI
script from being compressed once more.
Reviewed by: Ian Holsman, Jeff Trawick

author: stas
msg: make sure not to include 'use Apache2' for the mod_perl build itself

author: jim
msg: Add some words about 1.3 as it relates to development
